data.title: Invest in Apple Stock
data.meta_description: Get Apple stock quote in real-time, analyze price movement and start CFD trading using our advantages of tight spreads. Buy Apple stock or sell it on IFC Markets.
data.text:
Company Profile

Apple Inc. is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino, California. It is the worldâ€™s second largest information technology company. Apple designs, develops and sells consumer electronics, computer software, personal computers, and online services.

What does Apple do?

The company offers its hardware products: the iPhone smartphone, the iPad tablet, the Mac PC, the iPod portable media player, the Apple Watch, the Apple TV digital media player, and the HomePod speaker.

When was Apple Founded?

Apple was founded in April of 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne.
